bed.Body: You wake up in a bed. You remember that you entered yourself into an escape room trial group.

Choices.Text: Take a look around.

start.Body:
You are checking out your surroundings and you see...
A fairly plain green-painted room that has very simple furnishings and a green door.
There are four points of interest in the room.

Choices.Text: Walk over to the next door.
Walk over to the bookcase.
Walk over to the office desk.
Walk over to the fridge.

locked door.Body: The door seems to be locked with no way of opening it.

Choices.Text: Walk back over to the center of the room.

bookcase.Body: It is a simple bookcase. It has some popular old books that you recognize.

Choices.Text: Walk back to the center of the room.

office desk.Body: It is a simple brown wooden office desk. It seems like the type of desk a principal would sit at.

Choices.Text: Walk back to the center of the room.

fridge.Body:
You open the fridge.
There are three items in the fridge.
A bottle of water.
A sandwich that has a large amount of green lettuce inside it. Also, there is a strange lump on the sandwich.
A container of chocolate pudding.

Choices.Text: Walk back to the center of the room.
Poke the sandwich.

sandwich.Body: The green locked door swings open.

Choices.Text: Walk over to the now open door.

open green door.Body:
In the next room, you can see a room that is fairly similar to the first yet it is light blue instead.
There are four points of interest in the room.

Choices.Text: Walk over to the fish tank.
Walk over to the potted plant.
Walk over to the cabinets.
Walk over to the next door.

fish tank.Body: There seems to be a suspicious mound at the bottom of the fish tank.

Choices.Text: Walk back to the center of the room.

potted plant.Body: It is just an ordinary potted plant. The plant has some blooming white flowers. You don't really know the name of them.

Choices.Text: Walk back to the center of the room.

cabinets.Body: It is an ordinary set of cabinets. The cabinets are made out of a nice piece of maple wood that is lacquered.

Choices.Text: Walk back to the center of the room.

locked blue door.Body: The door seems to be locked with no way of opening it.

Choices.Text: Walk back to the center of the room.

blue key.Body: You picked up a blue key.

Choices.Text: Walk back to the center of the room.

open blue door.Body:
Inside the next room, you can see a solid yellow room.
There are four points of interest in the room.

Choices.Text: Walk over to the reclining chair
Walk over to the lamp.
Walk over to the gumball dispenser.

foundKey.Text: Walk through the yellow door of light.

reclining chair.Body:
It is a simple reclining chair.
It looks comfortable.

Choices.Text: Walk back over to the center of the room.

lamp.Body: The lamp seems to have a yellow switch on it.

Choices.Text: Walk back over to the center of the room.

A gumball dispenser.Body:
It is a simple gumball dispenser.
It only has mint gum.

Choices.Text: Walk back over to the center of the room.

lit lamp.Body: The lamp's light reveals a yellow door.

Choices.Text: Walk back over to the center of the room.

open yellow door.Body:
In the next room, you can see a room that is fairly similar to the other rooms yet it is completely red instead.
There are four points of interest in the room.

Choices.Text: Walk over to the coat rack.
Walk over to the dining table.
Walk over to the red carpet.
Walk over to the next door.

coat rack.Body:
It is a simple coat rack.
There are no coats on it.

Choices.Text: Walk back over to the center of the room.

dining table.Body:
It is a simple dining table.
There are no utensils or plates.

Choices.Text: Walk back over to the center of the room.

red carpet.Body:
There seems to be a large bump in the center of the red carpet.
Do you step on it?

Choices.Text: Step on the bump.
Walk back over to the center of the room.

locked red door.Body: The door seems to be locked with no way of opening it.

Choices.Text: Walk back over to the center of the room.
Walk over to the now open door.

open red door.Body:
In the next room, you can see a room that is fairly similar to the other rooms yet it is jet black instead.
There are three points of interest in the room.

Choices.Text: Walk over to the dresser.
Walk over to the lawn chair.
Walk over to the next door.

dresser.Body: It is a simple brown wooden dresser. This dresser is made out of a dark oak.

Choices.Text: Walk back over to the center of the room.

lawn chair.Body: It is a simple lawn chair. The chair has a green mesh with an aluminum frame.

Choices.Text: Walk back over to the center of the room.

black door.Body:
To your absolute surprise, this door is actually not locked.
Do you open it?

Choices.Text: Walk back over to the center of the room.
Open the door.

End of the test.Body:
You open the door and you see a man holding a sign saying congradulations. He is also holding a large check like the ones you see on television.
Do you celebrate or not do anything?

Choices.Text: Not do anything.
Say "Yippee."

not do anything.Body:
The man says,"I thought you would've been happier after winning the prize."
The test ends there.

celebrate.Body:
The man says,"That is the spirit!"
The test ends there.
